comment: First of all, I gotta say Kaufman is a nice guy and is very smart. He wrote the book you read for his class. But he is FARR too old to be teach, his hearing is completely gone, by that I mean it's impossible to have a conversation with him. In his textbook most of the answers are wrong and same for his test.  Literally the worst class I have taken
the midterm was 9 multiple choice questions. easy, right? no, three of them didn't even have the right answers as an option and he only threw out one

He's a cranky old guy at times, but overall he communicates pretty well and is by no means out to ruin any lives. I guess he's kinda like the old **** uncle that is cool as hell sometimes but can really be a s.o.b. other times.
nope, didnt enjoy those classes at all, needs to move on out of the teaching field.
sucks as a teacher, great at his work but sucks as a teacher
